name: Myunjoule
description:
(DEV NOTE:  Due to time constraints, we were unable to put in any dialogue past Yorker so it is primarily a display of my spouse, Kazvery's, beautiful artwork. We plan on touching it up and uploading it after it is unlocked.)

Welcome to Myunjoule, a moonlet of an ancient planet. Humans are long gone and their machinations are all that remain.

Controls:

  • WASD - Movement
  • Activate - E

Source & Team:

  • https://github.com/GeekzGamingz/Myunjoule
  • Programing: JackOfTrades, Zeuk
  • Pixel Art: Kazvery
  • Story: AceTrainerToken

Commissioned Artists:

  • Music: Muresan Radu (https://www.fiverr.com/muresanradu)
  • SFX: Juhani Junkala (https://juhanijunkala.com/)
